mail.credential_changed.content:
You're receiving this e-mail because your credential type: ${CREDENTIAL_TYPE} changed on DomiSMP ${SMP_INSTANCE_NAME}!

If you did not update your credential, please inform DomiSMP administrator immediately.


If you are having trouble accessing your account, reset your password.

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested a credential type: ${CREDENTIAL_TYPE} reset on DomiSMP ${SMP_INSTANCE_NAME} for your user account.
Please go to the following page and choose a new password:

${RESET_URL}
